message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I take a bit more considering the inflation rate is worse for you.
Your initial offer was a bit too much in your favor. Let's meet closer to the middle, considering the inflation.
The inflation is affecting you more than me, Bob. I'm standing firm on my previous offer.
Alice, this is a slight improvement on my previous offer.  We're running out of time, and the inflation is eating away at our potential gains. Let's be reasonable and close this deal.
